title: Let's just be careful here people...
body:
We just got this space, let's try and keep it ok?

Nothing wrong with ripping into each other if you are all in on the joke but at least try and keep stuff clean for those people less aware of GD's...um... _communication conventions _  who come stumbling in wanting to be part of the community only to get their head ripped off or cop spatter from a train wreck and get thoroughly alienated.  OK? 
{{champion:33}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:33}} 

Riot will probably have a few passing glances at this space every once in a while and review its relevancy so let's not lose our heads.
